column4: I have a t42 notebook with atheros wireless chip made for america markets.the wireless chip firmware set regdomain to 0x64,and can't work with wifi channel 13 on winxp.if I switch to ubuntu or debian,linux os could connect with ap via channel 13? I 'm in japan now
I suggest you try with booting from a live CD
I suggested something - did that work?
what is the matter? how should we know, download a live CD and try it
